meta.title: Armen Asriyan - Junior Full-Stack Developer
meta.description: A personal website and portfolio of Armen Asriyan, a junior full-stack developer with experience in Next.js, React, TypeScript, Node.js, and various other technologies.

hero.title: Hi, I'm Armen
hero.subtitle1: I'm a junior dev exploring the world of full-stack development.
hero.subtitle2: I enjoy creating clean, functional apps and constantly pushing myself to learn and improve.

project2.title: Company website
project2.description: Website presenting a company and its services

contact.title: Contact
contact.message1: Got an idea? A question? Or maybe just a really good cat gif to share?
contact.message2: Hit me up through the form or use any of the links below. I'm always happy to connect and collaborate.

consent.idle: This lofi radio stream is powered by YouTube. By selecting 'I consent', you agree to load the stream. Please note that YouTube may set cookies and collect usage data as part of this service.
consent.refused: You chose not to consent to loading the YouTube-powered lofi radio stream. No external content will be loaded.

messages.9:

meta.title: Legal Notice
meta.description: Official legal information about Armen Asriyan's personal portfolio website, including contact, ownership, and hosting details.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.name: Armen Asriyan
contact.notice: Complete contact details available upon written request to the above email address.

hosting.title: Hosting Information
hosting.address: 650 California St, San Francisco, CA 94108, USA

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.paragraph1: Unless otherwise stated, the textual content and custom visuals on this website are the property of Armen Asriyan. Icons used on this site are sourced from open-source libraries such as Lucide and Simple Icons and are used in accordance with their respective licenses.
intellectual.paragraph2: This site also includes embedded content from third-party platforms such as YouTube and may feature images or sounds sourced under various licenses.
intellectual.paragraph3: All third-party content remains the property of its respective owners. Any unauthorized reproduction, modification, or use of original content from this site is strictly prohibited without prior written consent.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: For information about how we collect and process personal data, please see our

meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Privacy policy explaining how personal data is collected, used, and protected on Armen Asriyan's portfolio website. GDPR compliant.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: This privacy policy explains how Armen Asriyan ("I", "me", "my") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you visit and interact with this website (armenasriyan.dev).
introduction.paragraph2: This policy complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and French data protection laws.

contactFormData.title: Contact Form Data
contactFormData.description: When you use the contact form on this website, I collect:

items.name: Your name
items.timestamp: The date and time of your submission

cookiesAndLocalStorage.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookiesAndLocalStorage.description: This website uses minimal data storage:

items.consentPreferences: Consent preferences: Your choice regarding the YouTube lofi radio feature is stored locally in your browser to remember your preference
items.thirdPartyCookies: Third-party cookies: When you consent to load the YouTube lofi radio, YouTube may set cookies according to their privacy policy
items.themePreferences: Theme preferences: Your choice regarding the website theme is stored locally in your browser to remember your preference

contactFormData.title: Contact Form Data
contactFormData.description: I use your contact form information solely to:

items.maintain: Maintain a record of our communication

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.description: I process your personal data based on your consent when you voluntarily submit the contact form and for my legitimate interest in responding to inquiries about my services.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Retention
dataStorage.description: Your contact form data is stored in two locations:

locations.resend: Resend service: Form submissions are stored on Resend's servers for email delivery purposes
locations.email: Email inbox: I retain your messages in my email inbox as part of normal correspondence

dataStorage.retention: I keep your contact form messages for as long as necessary to respond to your inquiry and maintain business records. You can request deletion of your data at any time.

resend.title: Resend
resend.description: I use Resend to handle contact form submissions. Resend processes your form data according to their privacy policy. You can view Resend's privacy policy at

youtube.title: YouTube
youtube.description: When you consent to use the lofi radio feature, YouTube content is embedded on this website. YouTube may collect data according to their privacy policy. You can view YouTube's privacy policy at
youtube.consentNote: YouTube content only loads after you provide explicit consent, and your consent choice is stored locally in your browser.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

rights.access: Right of access: You can request a copy of the personal data I hold about you
rights.rectification: Right to rectification: You can request correction of inaccurate personal data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure: You can request deletion of your personal data
rights.restrict: Right to restrict processing: You can request that I limit how I use your data
rights.portability: Right to data portability: You can request your data in a portable format
rights.object: Right to object: You can object to processing of your personal data
rights.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent: You can withdraw consent at any time

yourRights.exerciseRights: To exercise any of the aforementioned rights, please feel free to reach out to me

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: I implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.description: I may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. I encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how your data is handled, please contact me at:
contactInfo.complaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the French data protection authority (CNIL) if you believe your data protection rights have been violated.

generalMessages.unsupportedAudio: Your browser does not support the audio element.
